title: How to get topic and write scripts for YouTube videos - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a few simple ways that you may follow to find topics for your channel: Check out what your competitors or creators in the same category are doing & what is performing better for them. Then just try to make a better video on the same topic to get views on it.Check what is trending from different websites like google trends etc. & make the videos on those topics. The greatest advantage of using google trends is that it also provides you with the keywords that people are using to search for a particular topic.If you are just starting a channel then these two ways to search for topics will help you a lot in getting the initial views on your channel.
